parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The file id, or a comma separated list of file ids.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: You can set the file header to either receive a json response, or the physical files in given format. Possible options are: application/json, application/pdf, image/png

parameters.name: filter[page_size]
parameters.description: When requesting multiple files with the Accept header set to "application/pdf" this filter determines the page size in the pdf. A page with size A4 will hold 4 files, while an A6 page will only hold 1.

parameters.name: filter[start_position]
parameters.description: This filter only applies when requesting mulitple files with the Accept header set to "application/pdf" and the page size set to A4. It determines the position of the file on the first page.
